column2: "I didn't really think I'd have to work so hard on the contents, too..."

"Ugh! I should be on the receiving
side of things!
Well, whatever, work is work!"
"I feel like giving my own sweets away as presents, but I'm so excited about the flavor. That's my secret special recipe!"

"But, my stock of the
ingredients just ran out...
Ah, do you understand? You get it?"

"That's right, I want you to get them for me!
Please! Think of it as helping me out!"
